channel.title: Pest control help!
channel.description:
1.I jus got done with my pest control editing and when i die i go back to home.... When i die at PC i wanna repawn back at PC, please guide me to the right spot --owwch 2. How to keep my items when i die at Pest Control also, so i respawn at Pest Control and i keep all my items when i die at Pest Control.
Thanks please help me much as you can! :) :D

item.title: Pest control help!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

This isn’t a spoonfeeding community. Number two can be answered because there is a tutorial on how to make Fun-Pk.
